targets.expr: sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", cluster="$cluster", container!=""}) by ($grouping)

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])) by ($grouping) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__interval])) by ($grouping)

sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}) by ($grouping)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}) by ($grouping) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!=""}) by ($grouping)

sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) by ($grouping)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", image!=""}) by ($grouping) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_memory:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) by ($grouping)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by ($grouping)

sum(container_memory_swap{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container != "", container != "POD"}) by ($grouping)

sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__interval])) by (pod)
